scripts.install: yarn workspace @binary/binary-node install --network-timeout 1000000 && yarn workspace @binary/binary-web install --network-timeout 1000000
scripts.build: concurrently "yarn workspace @binary/binary-node run build" "yarn workspace @binary/binary-web run build"
scripts.start: concurrently "yarn workspace @binary/binary-node run start" "yarn workspace @binary/binary-web run start"
